key_findings: Identified unsafe array access in src/lib/iss/api.ts:189
Root cause: undefined access to basicData.people in fetchCrewData()
Comprehensive analysis of filter() calls across multiple files

patterns_discovered: Lack of defensive null checking in external API calls
Inconsistent error handling across different modules
Potential hydration mismatches due to unhandled API failures
gotchas_discovered: Ad blockers can prevent API requests, causing undefined data
External API calls without proper error propagation
React hydration errors cascading from data fetch failures
recommendations: Add defensive null checking using optional chaining and nullish coalescing
Implement comprehensive try-catch error handling in API fetch functions
Create unit tests for API failure scenarios
Add user-friendly error messaging for tool execution failures
